title: Polestar O2 Concept Car and Steam Deck Impressions
description:
Marques and Andrew dive head first into a ton of EV news including some Rivian confusion and the new Polestar O2 concept car. Then they talk about TikTok changing its videos to a maximum of ten minutes and why there still isn't an Instagram app for the iPad. After that, they give some first impressions on the Valve Steam Deck. This episode has a little bit of everything.
